BNC User Reference Guide

<s>

s (s-unit) contains a sentence-like division of a text.
Class model.segLike
Declaration 
element s
{
   attribute n { text },
   ( model.global | model.phrase | model.divPart.spoken )+
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
n sequence number .
Status: Required
Datatype (1–1) text
Example
 <s n="1"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <w c5="VVB" hw="come" pos="VERB">Come </w>
  <w c5="AVP" hw="in" pos="ADV">in</w>
  <c c5="PUN">.</c>
 </s>
;
Module analysis
